sentences.en: At the head of the grave there was a small wooden cross.
sentences.cn: 坟头上有一个小小的木十字架。

sentences.en: Bach must be turning in his grave at the vulgarities of the twentieth century.
sentences.cn: 20世纪的庸俗趣味定会让巴赫在九泉之下辗转难眠。

sentences.en: He did die a pauper and is buried in an unmarked grave.
sentences.cn: 他死的时候一文不名，葬在一处无名墓穴中。

sentences.en: He lies in an unmarked grave at Elmton.
sentences.cn: 他长眠在爱尔莫顿一处无名冢下。

sentences.en: He might burn himself out and go to an early grave.
sentences.cn: 他可能会因为劳累过度而英年早逝。

sentences.en: I had grave misgivings about making the trip.
sentences.cn: 对于这次旅行我有过极大的顾虑。

sentences.en: I have grave doubts about his ability.
sentences.cn: 我十分怀疑他的能力。

sentences.en: I have grave doubts that the documents tell the whole story.
sentences.cn: 我对这些文件能否说明所有的问题深表怀疑。

sentences.en: Let us rest his body in his family grave.
sentences.cn: 我们把他的遗体安放在他的祖坟中吧.

sentences.en: Matthew’s life is in grave danger .

sentences.en: She tore the rose apart and scattered the petals over the grave.
sentences.cn: 她掰开玫瑰花，将花瓣撒在坟墓上。

sentences.en: The house was dark and silent as the grave.
sentences.cn: 那屋子里一片漆黑,沉寂得像座坟墓.

sentences.en: The old man has one foot in the grave.
sentences.cn: 那位老人已是风烛残年.

sentences.en: The report expressed grave concern over the technicians’ lack of training.
sentences.cn: 报告中对技术人员缺乏培训深表忧虑。

sentences.en: The situation is becoming very grave.
sentences.cn: 形势变得非常严峻。

sentences.en: There is grave concern for the safety of witnesses.
sentences.cn: 人们非常担心证人的安全。

sentences.en: There might be something beyond the grave, you know, and not nothingness.
sentences.cn: 坟墓之外也许还有些什么，你知道，并非万事皆空。

sentences.en: Two men were standing by the freshly dug grave.
sentences.cn: 两名男子站在新挖的坟墓边。

sentences.en: Two reporters had to help lower the coffin into the grave.
sentences.cn: 两名记者不得不帮忙把灵柩慢慢地放进墓穴中。

sentences.en: Universities are facing grave problems because of diminishing resources.
sentences.cn: 由于资源的减少，大学正面临严峻的问题。

sentences.en: We visited Grandma's grave.
sentences.cn: 我们给祖母扫了墓。
